### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to supply fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using entities that require ingredients but having no ingredients
-  Ensure that the required ingredients are available before using entities that require them
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected to a power source
-  Connect the steam engine to a power source before using it
### Errors when using electricity group but not being plugged into electric network
-  Plug the electricity group into the electric network before using it
### Errors when using pipe group but being empty
-  Ensure that the pipe group is not empty before using it
### Errors when using belt group but being empty
-  Ensure that the belt group is not empty before using it

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   No important variables have been assigned.
